name: Dangerous Extreme Golfing
description:
Your typical GOLF game, except more dangerous and extreme

Made in 2 weeks, I felt like creating something that i can finish up real quick, here's the result. IMPORTANT: Recommended to play in the browser 

Controls:
MOUSE: Drag and shoot
M: Mute sound
ESCAPE: Go back to menu

Music from https://filmmusic.io

"Ice Flow" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Please Enjoy
